markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=2580) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic. Choose one element. Until the end of your next turn, your Strikes deal an additional 1d6 damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), bludgeoning for [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), fire for [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), or cold for [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165).

<title level="2">Elemental Assault leads to...</title>
[Continuous Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=2588), [Tetraelemental Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=2587)
name: Elemental Assault
